member.name: T:Intent.Modules.Common.CSharp.Configuration.AppSettingRegistrationRequest
member.summary: For adding a section or key to a .NET configuration file. If the configuration file already contains a section or key with the provided , it is left untouched.
member.remarks: Templates for appsettings[.<>].json and Web/App[.<>].config files may listen for these requests and update themselves accordingly.

member.name: P:Intent.Modules.Common.CSharp.Configuration.AppSettingRegistrationRequest.Key
member.summary: For appsettings[.<>].json files, this is the top level section name to add. For Web/App[.<>].config files, this is "key" attribute value for the <settings /> element to add.

member.name: P:Intent.Modules.Common.CSharp.Configuration.AppSettingRegistrationRequest.Value
member.summary: The value to add for the .
member.remarks: For appsettings[.<>].json files, the object will be serialized to json (even an anonymous object works fine). For Web/App[.<>].config files, this needs to be a string as it's placed in the "key" attribute value for the <settings /> element being added.

member.name: P:Intent.Modules.Common.CSharp.Configuration.AppSettingRegistrationRequest.RuntimeEnvironment
member.summary: Optional. The specific appsettings.<>.json or Web/App.<>.config file to apply to, when not specified then the default appsettings.json or Web/App.config file is applied to.

member.name: P:Intent.Modules.Common.CSharp.Configuration.AppSettingRegistrationRequest.ForProjectWithRole
member.summary: Optional. Name of the output target 'Role' which must be present in the project within the Intent Architect Visual Studio designer.
member.remarks: Used for disambiguating which appsettings[.<>].json or Web/App[.<>].config file to apply to when a solution has multiple projects each with their own configuration file(s).

member.name: M:Intent.Modules.Common.CSharp.Templates.TemplateExtensions.ToCSharpIdentifier(System.String)
member.summary: An overload of where is set to .
member.remarks: See also: .

member.name: M:Intent.Modules.Common.CSharp.Templates.TemplateExtensions.ToCSharpIdentifier(System.String,Intent.Modules.Common.CSharp.Templates.CapitalizationBehaviour)
member.summary: Converts to a valid C# identifier name.
member.remarks:
The following rules are applied to the in the following order:
If the string is null or whitespace, an empty string is returned.
Occurrences of '#' are replaced with 'Sharp`.
Occurrences of '&' are replaced with 'And`.
Any invalid characters are replaced with a ' ' (these spaces are removed in a subsequent step).
In the event there are multiple words, each except for the first has its first letter capitalized and are then joined together.
is applied to first character.
If the first character is a number, then an '_' prefix is applied.
If the identifier is a C# keyword, then an '@' prefix is applied.
member.param: The value to change into a C# identifier.
The to use.
